author: stuart t
title: weekend break
text:
when we arrived at the hotel and walked in you could see that it was very clean and tidy, we booked in very quickly no hanging about the room was all ready for our stay, the staff was very helpful as to where the bus links are and as to the metro system and what lines to connect to for our travels around paris.
once in our room it was very cosy and comfortable and fresh and clean, our room was made up every day and left spotless, the breakfast was more than adequate plenty to choose from to start the day nothing seemed to much for the staff and catered for all needs (children) families over all I would recommend this hotel for its location as its very central for all restaurants bars all at reasonable prices.
Room Tip: if your looking to tour paris this hotel is central to all metro and bus links See more room tips
